body.content:
Sir,
Thank you for your information  noted.sorr  for late respond busy for
many projects at hand.

My wife and I are very happy  to donate the two million dollars to you
with Jeff  Johnson efg bank. We believe this
is a lifetime opportunity for you and your family. We believe you have
read the web link we sent you in our previous email. We have been
deeply involved in charity programs over the past years, investing in
people and being involved in several health care schemes. We want to
touch the life of several people across the globe with our Euro
Millions Winnings. We also have a plan in place to build a Standard
Facility Hospital in a good location in your country. The Hospital
will administer free health care to the less privileged in a remote
area.

You should including your INFORMATION'S  to prepare the necessary
documents for the release of the $2, Million Million dollars  to you
through online banking or  other options from the bank.I will give you
the payng bank information  when i hear from you, will you like to
receive the funds by cash payment to your country, do let me know or
by bank online transfer.

My wife and I humbly urge you to cooperate with  the bank  and adhere
to his instruction. You should try and make good use of the money when
you receive it. We want you to use the money to improve your life
and that of your family. and charity homeless  We expect you to help
people around you who are in need charity homeles and church and needs
 ones. We trust and believe that you will make adequate use of the
funds donated to you.

We expect to hear from you now and after you have received your money.
we have trusted you for sharing with the charity one million dollars
for you and one million dollars for charity. and kindly see  our
picture
on  our website  to  know  us one day we shall meet and have dinner together

Noted,with my heart of love i donated this funds to the charity and
for your family, like i said one million dollars for you   and your
family to invest for your life investment , and one million dollars
for the charity  and homeless,  i trusted you will do it with
good-heart of love  and pace and unity. Please do not expose my
information to the hacks scammer  do keep all our information
communication within yourself,when i hear from you to assured me you
will do the good work to donate to the charity as i stated.  I have
trusted you, I have done much investments and invested in life of
others see our  website

To verify our identity how we have invest and supported, please visit
the web page below;  copy it and paste

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2559532/Britains-biggest-Lotto-winners-buy-3-million-Scottish-mansion-viewing-just-TEN-minutes.html

Kindly do contact urgent  to me to directto the paying bank,  me and
my wife are always busy  and moving around the world investment,  we
just donated to the country that has  the coronavirus COVID-19
pandemics .  anything you do in life  always keep within yourself
because in this life there Enise that do not want their brothers  and
sisters  to progress in life, even your Government of your country can
be your enemies peoples around  you can be your enemy be careful, and
use this funds acordly.

pace and love be into us.

Sincerely,

Chris and Colin Weir"

header.subject: FROM COLIN CHRIS AND WIFE DO SEND YOUR INFORMATION'S
